pull.title: Only use dnsseeds when not on testnet.
pull.body: As we have no testnet dnsseeds.

repo.name: bitcoin
repo.description: Bitcoin (dont fork from here, fork from bitcoin/bitcoin)

events.body: We should do this for hardcoded nodes as well?

Seed nodes are already ignored on testnet:
if (mapAddresses.empty() && (GetTime() - nStart > 60 || fTOR) && !fTestNet)

events.message: Only use dnsseeds and static seeds when not on testnet.

events.body: It would appear that I am blind, anyway, printf moved (I was thinking hopefully someone would do dnsseeds for testnet in the distant future, but that shouldnt mean I put the printf out of the if now).

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -1147,17 +1147,20 @@ void DNSAddressSeed()
 
     printf("Loading addresses from DNS seeds (could take a while)\n");
